jobs_results.title: Senior Kotlin and Swift Developer
jobs_results.description:
We are looking for a Senior Kotlin and Swift Developer who will be responsible for developing and maintaining mobile apps on both Android and iOS platforms. You will work closely with developers, designers, and product managers to ensure the app is efficient, reliable, and user-friendly.

Work at Exadel - Who We Are Since 1998, Exadel has been engineering its products and custom software for clients of all sizes. Headquartered in Walnut Creek, California, Exadel has 2,800+ employees in development centers across America, Europe, and Asia. Our people drive Exadelâ€™s success and are at the core of our values.

About the CustomerOur client is passionate about making the world more accessible using our state-of-the-art tech, which is made for consumers and enterprises, and working on a life-changing product - the best phone call captioning application. The team treats the application as its own. Transparency is another important factor.

Requirementsâ€¢ Background in mobile app development with Kotlin and Swift
â€¢ Understanding of Android and iOS development ecosystems
â€¢ Experience with state management and testing frameworks
â€¢ Problem-solving skills and attention to detail
â€¢ Passionate about building inclusive, user-focused applications
â€¢ A team player who values transparency, collaboration, and mutual support

Nice to HaveFamiliarity with cross-platform development using React Native

English levelFluent

Responsibilitiesâ€¢ Develop and maintain mobile applications using Kotlin for Android and Swift for iOS
â€¢ Collaborate with a cross-functional team, including backend developers, to integrate mobile apps with Golang-based microservices
â€¢ Optimize native modules for handling audio and calls, ensuring smooth and efficient communication for users
â€¢ Write clean, maintainable, and testable code, following best practices in mobile development
â€¢ Participate in code reviews, providing constructive feedback and promoting high-quality standards
â€¢ Contribute to the continuous improvement of our development processes and tools
â€¢ Tech stack: Kotlin, Swift, React Native, Golang, Microservices, OpenAPI, Zustand, React Query, React Native Testing Library, Maestro

Advantages of Working with ExadelTransparent Career Roadmapâ€¢ Your career growth is in your hands, so each Exadeller decides when to level up and initiate performance assessments
â€¢ The employee has a formal salary review once a year

Learning & Development Opportunitiesâ€¢ We believe in nurturing talent and fostering growth. That's why we budget every year for your continuous learning journey. From professional development courses to books and certification, we're invested in your success
â€¢ Polish language lessons with a native speaker are fully covered, and English lessons for $2 gross per lesson are available for Exadel language learners
â€¢ Every specialist gets free access to the Coursera Education platform

Work-Life Balanceâ€¢ Operating from the office or remotely is an employee's choice. Hybrid or remote employees will receive all necessary equipment at their home addresses before their first working day. The office network in Warsaw, Poznan, Gdansk, Szczecin, Bialystok, Krakow, and Lublin, is open daily for those who prefer to work in office
â€¢ The team meets at two annual team-building events across locations; in addition there are team events such as Pizza Days, Programmerâ€™s Day, informal meetups, board game parties, and sports initiatives

Employeeâ€™s Perks & Bonusesâ€¢ Exadellers have access to Worksmile platforms for Multisport compensation, medical insurance packages in Luxmed or Medicover centers, and online stores and services
â€¢ We understand the importance of balancing work and personal life. Exadellers who take 14 vacation calendar days or more receive a gross extra payment of 1,550 PLN. In case of childbirth, the employee receives a 2,000 PLN bonus, gross
â€¢ The Exadel referral program involves recognition for hired recommended professionals. Depending on the position of the hired recommended candidate, each employee receives a gross monetary bonus from 1,000 PLN to 6,500 PLN

jobs_results.title: Remote Senior IOS Developer
jobs_results.description: PKO BP Finat is looking for Remote Senior IOS Developer

jobs_results.title: Senior iOS Developer - Spanish/English - Full Remote
Senior iOS developer with Flutter
jobs_results.description:
Hello,
We are called People More because we treat our employees with respect, but also because the projects we work on are for people and should be easy and pleasant to use. We are technological, but we look at the bigger picture :)
People More has been in existence for over three years and is an offshoot of one of the country's oldest interactive agencies - Insignia. The company is made up of people with a huge client base in the country and abroad, for whom we build projects from scratch (UX, UI, frontend, backend, mobile) or in part. We work directly for our clients and also support our partners in their own solutions. This ensures a wide range of projects and the ability to change! We work with clients all over the world.
For the project that we are working on with our foreign partner, we are looking for Senior iOS developer with Flutter.

Your duties will include:
â€¢ You will work remotely in a mixed team of People More specialists and client people.
â€¢ You will work in an international environment, in Polish and English
â€¢ The main tasks you will be involved in are: developing and implementation high quality mobile application, collaborate with designers and developers to implement technical requirements
â€¢ As part of our team, you will be working in one of the most exciting and key areas of technology, with endless opportunities for growth and development
â€¢ You will be a very important part of the team creating high performance websites for a wide range of audiences!

Requirements that must be met:
â€¢ Strong experience with iOS minimum 6 years
â€¢ Experience with Flutter
â€¢ Knowledge of Swift and Objective-see
â€¢ Very good English and Polish
â€¢ German is a plus

What we offer:
â€¢ We are open and honest and we solve problems instead of generating them.
â€¢ Maybe itâ€™s obvious, but we really respect our employees and associates. We used to be software developers, too, and we appreciate that job!
â€¢ A small team
â€¢ An international working environment and international projects
â€¢ Private medical care
â€¢ Sports card
â€¢ Training courses
â€¢ Work that is 100% remote (unless you prefer another system)

We have an office in Krakow, but if you like to work remotely, thatâ€™s absolutely fine. Over the next few months, we plan to continue working this way. After that, you decide according to what you prefer. We are OK with fully remote work. For us, you can be located anywhere. :)

If you are not sure if you meet the requirements, applyâ€”weâ€™ll talk and give you an honest answer.

Why itâ€™s a good idea to work with People More?
â€¢ If you are not satisfied with your work or your tasks, weâ€™ll find a way out together!
â€¢ If you get bored, we will offer you a new product and new, fascinating tasks
â€¢ We will work on your brand together: you will get an opportunity to attend conferences, including as a speaker, and we will help you publish in recognized magazines and online
â€¢ We will facilitate your access to challenges that are usually difficult to get
â€¢ At any time, you can talk directly to the board of People Moreâ€”we talk your language because the companyâ€™s founders are software developers and designers!
â€¢ What does the recruitment process look like?
â€¢ A friendly remote initial interview
â€¢ A remote technical talk
â€¢ The decision to work together!
Salary

up to 150 PLN/h
contract

B2B
Location

KrakÃ³w / remote

jobs_results.title: Junior iOS Engineer
jobs_results.description:
As a Junior iOS Engineer, you will contribute to development of our digital banking platform with focus on mobile deliverables. You will be part of a cross-functional mobile team responsible for assigned functionalities for both Android and iOS applications.

What you'll do

With guidance from more senior team members, you will develop and enhance platform components like SDKs and libraries in line with functional and nonfunctional requirements. You will participate and conduct peer reviews of the code. You will get involved in broader mobile initiatives allowing you to grow to the next level.

Who you are

Youâ€™re a driven iOS Engineer with a strong passion for building top-tier mobile products. You thrive in dynamic environments and enjoy translating complex business challenges into elegant technical solutions. You also understand the value of collaboration and soliciting opinions and approaches.
â€¢ You have hands-on coding experience (1-2 years) with SwiftYou have hands-on experience with clean architecture patterns such as MVVMYou understand the SDLC process and its application with continuous integration tools like Bitrise; experience in GitHub Actions is a plus
â€¢ You have an engineering mindset, placing high importance on clean code, proper documentation, and modern software practices.
â€¢ You have a proactive approach allowing you to be self-providing and quick learning, in order to mitigate impediments
â€¢ You are already based in KrakÃ³w
â€¢ You are ready to come to the office twice per week

jobs_results.title: Senior Mobile Test Automation focus on iOS Application Testing
jobs_results.description:
We are looking for an experienced Mobile Test Automation Engineer with a strong background in testing iOS applications. In this role, you will collaborate closely with a team of mobile engineers to test mobile SDKs, integrated with mobile UI testing frameworks, with a primary focus on iOS platforms.

The Mobile Divisionâ€™s mission is to develop cutting-edge tools and SDKs that enable developers to identify accessibility (a11y) issues during the development process. These tools are designed to help deliver more inclusive and accessible mobile applications, setting new standards for accessibility in the mobile industry.

Customer

Our Customer is the rapidly growing technology leader in digital accessibility software, helping enterprises make their web and mobile offerings accessible to everyone. Its AI-enabled products save developer time and reduce risk via proprietary discovery and analysis algorithms that integrate directly into software development pipelines.

Requirements
â€¢ A minimum of 3 years of experience in mobile application testing
â€¢ Proven experience in automation testing for mobile platforms, with a primary focus on iOS
â€¢ Proficient in at least one of the following programming languages: Swift or Objective-C
â€¢ Hands-on experience with mobile automation frameworks such as XCTest, EarlGrey, or Appium
â€¢ Familiarity with mobile operating systems and their debugging tools (Xcode for iOS, ADB for Android)
â€¢ Experience with Git and CI tools such as GitHub Actions, CircleCI
â€¢ At least an Upper-Intermediate level of English

Would be a plus:
â€¢ Experience working with Kotlin or Java
â€¢ Hands-on experience with device farms such as SauceLabs, BrowserStack, or AWS Device Farm

Personal Profile
â€¢ Strong analytical and algorithmic thinking, with a proven ability to identify root causes and suggest effective solutions
â€¢ Excellent attention to detail
â€¢ A mindset focused on continuous improvement and workflow optimization for both personal and team processes

Responsibilities
â€¢ Design, develop, and execute test plans, test cases, and test scripts based on product requirements
â€¢ Develop, maintain, and enhance test automation frameworks for mobile SDKs testing, with a strong focus on iOS and some for Android
â€¢ Create, execute, and manage automated test suites using tools like XCTest, EarlGrey, and Appium
â€¢ Execute manual and automated functional, regression, compatibility, and performance testing
â€¢ Manage testing environments across physical and virtual devices, integrating with device farms
â€¢ Integrate automated tests with CI/CD pipelines for continuous delivery
â€¢ Provide clear and regular status reports on testing progress and results
â€¢ Collaborate closely with developers and product owners to ensure thorough understanding of business requirements
â€¢ Promote and implement best practices in mobile test automation, accessibility testing, and SDK validation

jobs_results.description: Infinity Group is looking for iOS Developer Tech Lead
